author: christopheralanwest
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is the Run 3 analog of PR #32224 and updates the quark-gluon likelihood tag for AK4chs jets. See the description of that PR for details.

#### PR validation:

See description of PR #32224 for details. In addition, a technical test was performed: `runTheMatrix.py -l limited,7.23,12834.0 --ibeos`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This PR is not a backport and should not be backported.
title: Update quark-gluon likelihood tag for Run 3 MC
